name: Xi Xiong
tagline: School of Software, Tsinghua University, xixiong91@gmail.com
body:
I am a student pursuing my master degree in the School of Software in Tsinghua University, from 2012 to 2015. Previously, I got my bachelor degree in the School of Software of Tsinghua University, Beijing, China. My interest covers indoor localization, mobile sensing, finite field multipliers.

### Working Articles
Xi Xiong, and Haining Fan, $GF(2^{n})$ Bit-Parallel Squarer Using Generalized Polynomial Basis For a New Class of Irreducible Pentanomials, submitted to Electronics Letters.

Xi Xiong, and Haining Fan, Bit-Parallel $GF(2^n)$ Squarer Using Shifted Polynomial Basis, submitted to IEEE Transactions on Computers.

### Skills
Proficient in Android programming and Java, familiar with C/C++, Assembly language, Linux, Java Script, XML, SQL Server, MatLab, LaTeX.

Quick learner with broad knowledge in programming and research.

###Adwards
2007, 1st Prize in National Physics Contest in Provinces

2007, 2nd Prize in National Mathematics Contest in Provinces

2009, 2nd Prize in National College Physics Contest

2010, 3rd Prize in Challenge Cup of Tsinghua University

###Experiences
